data.title: Alexandra Fox
data.meta_description: Alex Fox guides families through trusts and estate planning, advises fiduciaries, manages all related litigation, and assists in complex real estate litigation.
data.text:
Alexandra “Alex” Fox is an Associate in Maynard’s Trusts, Estates, Fiduciaries, & Family Business Practice Group. Our family business attorneys understand the value of unique familial dynamics in this specialized area of law. Maynard’s fiduciary group represents clients through all aspects of risk assessment, evaluation, alternate dispute resolution, and litigation. In her practice, Alex focuses on guiding families through areas of trusts and estate planning. She also advises fiduciaries and manages all related litigation. Additionally, Alex is a part of the Commercial Real Estate Practice Group, assisting in complex real estate litigation and transitional work.

Alex received her J.D. from Florida State University, graduating magna cum laude. While at Florida State, she worked as the Article Selection Editor for the Florida State University Law Review and a brief writer for the WVA of Law National Energy and Sustainability Moot Court Competition. She holds a B.S. in Public Relations from the University of Florida.
